from openpyxl import load_workbook
wb = load_workbook(''output/crud-matrix/CRUD_car-center-devlab_20251020-144343.xlsx'')
ws = wb[''CRUD Matrix'']
for i in range(1, 10):
    row_values = [str(cell.value) if cell.value else '''' for cell in ws[i]]
    print(f''Row {i}: {row_values[:3]}'')  # 처음 3개 컬럼만 출력
